DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Plus Nutritional Counseling Promoting Weight Loss People With Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Binge eat disorder ( BED ) one common eat disorder , million affect Americans . The majority people binge eat mildly severely overweight , people normal weight also BED . People BED frequently eat excessive amount food short period time , often feeling loss control urge eat . Following binge eat episode , person usually experience feeling guilt , depression , embarrassment , disgust . Beyond psychological distress cause binge eating , people binge eat high risk serious health problem associate weight gain , include high blood pressure , diabetes , heart disease , high cholesterol , stroke . Previous study BED find cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) effective treatment improve binge eat habit , attitudinal feature eat disorder , psychological functioning . However , CBT alone nearly effective produce clinically significant weight loss overweight . This study evaluate effectiveness add nutritional counseling CBT treat obese people BED . Participants 1-year study randomly assign one two treatment group : CBT plus general nutrition counseling ( CBT+GN ) CBT plus low energy density diet counseling ( CBT+LED ) . All participant receive 21 hourly individual treatment session 6-month period . Sessions weekly Weeks 1 16 every week Weeks 17 26 . Each treatment session include 40 minute CBT 20 minute nutritional counseling ( GN LED ) . Assessments include interview questionnaire symptom height weight measurement . These assessment occur baseline , monthly treatment , 6 month post-treatment . At end treatment , participant also blood drawn determine lipid level ask complete two food intake interview phone .
